GIORiderProvisions.Description: --> The primary insured must be between ages 0 and 37 --> The minimum specified amount may not be less than the minimum amount available for the base product (under our issue rules on the option date) --> The maximum specified amount is $50,000 or the face amount of the base policy, if less --> This benefit is not issued with a special class --> It may be issued only to a primary insured who has no table ratings or is charged a flat extra premium of no more than $5 per thousand for aviation, occupation or avocation
